sentences.en: All day he did nothing but contemplate.
sentences.cn: 他整天除了沉思外没做任何事.

sentences.en: Both tests really contemplate a standard of " reasonableness, " which no one can define with precision.
sentences.cn: 两个标准均考虑 " 合情合理 " 的标准,可没人能够准确地作出界定.

sentences.en: Contemplate the problem before making a final decision.
sentences.cn: 做最后决定前,仔细考虑一下这个问题.

sentences.en: Every inhabitant of this planet must contemplate that it may no longer be habitable.
sentences.cn: 世界上每个人都必须思考到地球上可能不再适合人住的那一天.

sentences.en: He contemplated her with a faint smile.
He could not contemplate anything so desperate as desertion.
sentences.cn: 紧急关头他怎么也不会想到抛弃朋友不管.

sentences.en: He goes to the park every day to sit and contemplate.
sentences.cn: 他每天去公园,坐在那里沉思默想.

sentences.en: He may try to blast his way out of trouble, playing attacking shots to balls he would not normally contemplate hitting.
sentences.cn: 他可能是想努力摆脱困境，平时不会考虑击打的球也打起了进攻。

sentences.en: I do not contemplate any opposition from him.
It afforded a vista pleasant to contemplate.
It is perhaps pointless to contemplate what might have been changing.
sentences.cn: 揣测情况可能如何演变也许是件无聊的事情.

sentences.en: It terrified me to contemplate the consequence of your action.
sentences.cn: 想到你行动的后果,我就感到害怕.

sentences.en: It was fairly easy to contemplate the race issue in the shop.
sentences.cn: 在这店里看到种族问题那是相当容易的.

sentences.en: Jack went on vacation to contemplate his future.
sentences.cn: 杰克去度假，仔细思考一下他的未来。

sentences.en: The consequences would be too ghastly to contemplate.
The possibility of war is too horrifying to contemplate.
sentences.cn: 战争的可能性太可怕了,真不堪细想.

sentences.en: What a wonderful scene they contemplate from the heights.
sentences.cn: 从高处看到的风景多么美啊!

trans.tran_cn: 考虑，沉思，苦思冥想，凝视
trans.tran_en: to look at someone or something for a period of time in a way that shows you are thinking

trans.tran_cn: 盘算， 计议； 思量， 对…周密考虑； 注视， 凝视
